product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Quarter Cube
long_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Quarter Cube offers a lightweight way to keep clothing and accessories organized when traveling-it's extremely light, translucent and water resistant. Eagle Creek Quarter Cube is great for T-shirts, shorts, underwear and various necessities. Includes a quick-grab handle. Lightweight, ripstop, silicone-impregnated nylon resists weather and stains; translucent fabric allows visibility and quick identification of items inside.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Pack-It(TM) Specter Quarter Cube offers a lightweight way to keep clothing and accessories organized when traveling-it's extremely light, translucent and water resistant.
